A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The last Jedi alienates half of its fan base because instead of being a Star Wars film. Rain Johnson decided to make it a political statement. 
 
Men are the Root of Evil

Capitalism is Evil

The old ways are wrong

This is why people are so divided with this movie because it is trying to push a belief that only 50% of the people believe in. Star Wars is supposed to be a fun enjoyable fantasy world that most everyone can escape to but Rain Johnson has turned it into a political nightmare.
